item.title: Toggles
item.description: Methods There are 2 ways to make toggles, one is the most common ones if you look at tutorials online and follows the VRChat request/standard to not use “Write Defaults” in animations. The other is an alternative way that goes a bit against the standard put in by VRChat but is, in my opinion and only for simple toggles, a little bit faster and less prone to errors.
